summary: Anguilla is a small British territory in the Caribbean Sea. It's part of an island group called the Leeward Islands. The main island, also named Anguilla, is about 16 miles long and 3 miles wide. There are also some tiny, uninhabited islands nearby. Anguilla is located north of Saint Martin and east of Puerto Rico. Its capital is The Valley, and it has a population of around 15,753 people.
title: Anguilla
